changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.update_guild_vault_name') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.update_guild_vault_name GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.update_guild_vault_name @id TINYINT, @guild_id dbo.id_t, @name NVARCHAR(12) AS SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE dbo.Guild_Vaults SET name = @name WHERE guild_id = @guild_id AND id = @id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.update_guild_vault_name') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.update_guild_vault_name GO
